TopicTitle: Help with adding ladder and hatch for my new model

Articles.Content:
I have seen many tutorials like this one but I am total noob with Unity, could someone give me a more detailed tutorial then this one .

http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Adding_Airlocks_and_Ladders_to_Parts

im even having trouble importing. Thank for the help !
This would probably be better put to the people in the Addons forums. The Support forum is pretty much just for issues with the game itself, rather than how to modify it.
